scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of case files and administrative files documenting Reed's sittings on federal circuit panels after his retirement from the Supreme Court. The majority of materials document Reed's sittings on panels for the Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia, including panels with judges Warren Burger, Charles Fahy, and David Bazelon.
Arranged into two sub-series: Opinions and Records.

For more papers related to this period of Reed's career, please consult the following series: Other professional activities, Administrative files, Correspondence, News clippings, Personal papers, Photographs, Publications, Speeches, Subject files, and Memorabilia.
